ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“So what.
Everyone's gotta start sometime.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“The name's {Cloud}.
Used to be with SOLDIER,
I got no business with you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “He, HEY! Waitaminit you!!”{PAUSE}“You can't just walk outta here
without buyin' somethin'!”{PAUSE}“Might be unhealthy fer ya,
if ya know what I mean.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // “Heh heh…He'll forget about it.
OH, you!!”{PAUSE}“Get my friend on the second floor
to teach ya.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // “Don't act so big, amateur.
Seein' as how I'm such a warm hearted guy,
I'll show ya the ropes.”{PAUSE}“You come back here tomorrow.
I got some things I gots ta do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:5}); // “Hmmph!!
Well, I never heard of ya!”

dialogStrings: Sector 7 Weapon Shop

“He, HEY! Waitaminit you!!”{PAUSE}“You can't just walk outta here
without buyin' somethin'!”{PAUSE}“Might be unhealthy fer ya,
if ya know what I mean.”

“Hey!! What the--YOU!?”{PAUSE}“Anyone talking to me must be a novice.”
{CHOICE}Yep, that's me
{CHOICE}I used to be in SOLDIER,
{CHOICE} the name's {Cloud}

{Cloud}
“So what.
Everyone's gotta start sometime.”

{Cloud}
“The name's {Cloud}.
Used to be with SOLDIER,
I got no business with you.”

“Hmmph!!
Well, I never heard of ya!”

“Don't act so big, amateur.
Seein' as how I'm such a warm hearted guy,
I'll show ya the ropes.”{PAUSE}“You come back here tomorrow.
I got some things I gots ta do.”

“Heh heh…He'll forget about it.
OH, you!!”{PAUSE}“Get my friend on the second floor
to teach ya.”

“Crap!! Watch it, you old guy!”{PAUSE}“I was just about to rip up that smooth
little head of yours!”

“In the slums
ya gotta take care of yourself first.”{PAUSE}“I been livin' like that ever since I was a kid.”{PAUSE}“You wanna be tough like me?
Then you gotta pick out some good weapons.”

“Oh and uh, by the way
old guy…”{PAUSE}“You can see this store don't have no customers…
and even tough guys like me
could use a buck or two…”{PAUSE}“Ya think you could spare some cash?”
{CHOICE}Give him some
{CHOICE}Don't give him any
“YESSS…”

“Damn, man!!
Ya chinsey old %*&!”

“Hey old guy! I got a good-lookin' sister!!”
{CHOICE}Give him some
{CHOICE}Forget it

“What's the matter, old dude?
You don't like women?”

“You dried up old geez.
You tired?”{PAUSE}“Why don't you rest up
on the third floor of my house?”

“There's just one condition.”{PAUSE}“You gotta give me some cash.”
{CHOICE}1 gil
{CHOICE}10 gil
{CHOICE}nothin'
“Damn, man!! Just forget about it!”
“Oh man, oh man…”{PAUSE}“Go ahead 'n' help yourself to the room.”
“Cheap %#*^…”

“Geez, dude, you're really old.
You sure you ain't poorer than me?”

“Use whatever bed you want.
Sleep tight, old guy.”
